verses.text: How many, \nd Lord\nd*, \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* foes! \w Those|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* rise \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* many.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* say \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6965"\w* \w help|strong="H6965"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.” \qs Selah\qs*

\w But|strong="H7227"\w* \w you|strong="H5315"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w are|strong="H7227"\w* shield about \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w my|strong="H5315"\w* glory, \w who|strong="H5315"\w* lifts up \w my|strong="H5315"\w* head.

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* loudly \w I|strong="H3068"\w* call \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy hill \w he|strong="H3068"\w* gives answer. \qs Selah\qs*

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* laid \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* slept: \w now|strong="H7121"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* wake, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* sustains \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* myriads \w of|strong="H3068"\w* people \w who|strong="H3068"\w* beset \w me|strong="H5564"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3068"\w* side.

Arise, \nd Lord\nd*: save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* strikes \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* foes \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cheek, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* shatters \w the|strong="H5921"\w* teeth \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked.

\w Victory|strong="H3467"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* blessing descend \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H7563"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*
